LanguageData.TacticalComputer.label: Tactical Computer
LanguageData.TacticalComputer.description: This computer provides various informations and some options.
LanguageData.TacticalComputerExtension.label: Computer Terminal
LanguageData.TacticalComputerExtension.description: This computer terminal provides remote access to some options of the tactical computer.\nNote: The Tactical Computer is needed.
